Header.title: African Food Festival 2024
Header.paragraph: The African Food Festival Dallas (AFFDallas) is a gathering of food lovers, African food influencers, bloggers, and chefs with a focus on sharing happiness by celebrating the diversity and uniqueness of African food and culture. At AFFDallas, we will be bringing together families, friends, and associates while showcasing and celebrating the culinary rich and vast African delicacies from food vendors, restaurants, and chefs. Additionally, we will be showcasing African entertainers.

About.paragraph: Our diverse target audience includes adult men and women seeking culinary delights, youths and students eager for vibrant experiences, and children ready for family-friendly fun. Additionally, we welcome organizations and groups looking to engage in cultural celebrations. Join us for an inclusive and joyous event!

Features.title: Food Exhibitons
Features.text: The event focuses on celebrating food from across the African continent. Therefore, there will be food exhibitions with opportunities for participating audiences to excite their taste buds by exploring the various options of African foods at the festival.

Features.title: Food Competitions
Features.text: This event will feature amazing food-related activities, including Chef Face-offs, Eating Competitions, and Food Trivia for audience engagement. There will be lots of prizes to be won in the form of cash, gifts, and food items.

Features.title: Family Friendly
Features.text: This is a family event that both adults and kids can actively attend and participate in. Kids will enjoy dozens of games and activities, including a bouncing castle, horse rides, face painting, and more! Life-sized games will also be available for adults to enjoy at the festival.

Features.title: Music Performances
Features.text: Food and good music go hand-in-hand; therefore, various genres of African music will be spotlighted by the best African DJs to entertain the audience. Live stage performances by budding African artistes will also thrill the audience at the event. There will be a variety of music genres.
